mapper.insert: insert into user(email, pwd, name, withdraw, auth, phone) values(#{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, 0, 1, #{phone})
mapper.update: update user set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone = #{phone} where email=#{email}
update user set email=#{email}, name='xxxx', pwd='xxxx', phone='xxxx', withdraw = 1 where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select email, name from user where withdraw=0 and auth=1 order by email
select count(email) from user where email = #{email}
select count(email) as count, email from user where email=#{email}
select email from user where name=#{name} and phone=#{phone}
mapper.update: update user set pwd=#{pwd} where email=#{email}
